text: Darlawn is a census town in Aizawl district in the state of Mizoram, India. ==Geography== Darlawn is located at .Falling Rain Genomics, Inc - Darlawn It has an average elevation of 870 metres (2854 feet). ==Demographics== India census, Darlawn had a population of 3859. Males constitute 51% of the population and females 49%. Darlawn has an average literacy rate of 83%, higher than the national average of 59.5%: male literacy is 83% and, female literacy is 82%. In Darlawn, 13% of the population is under 6 years of age. ==References== Category:Aizawl Category:Cities and towns in Aizawl district
title: Darlawn
